events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery reported by the customer.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund process for this case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help resolve this quickly for you.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify the mistake?
I have attached the photos of the product here along with the order number 123456789 for your reference.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you should see the money back in your account within 5 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate the quick resolution and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund has been processed successfully on our end. Please allow up to 5 business days for it to reflect on your payment method.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else I can assist you with.
Yes, I have received the refund in my bank account today. Thank you very much for your assistance.
We are glad your issue is resolved. We have now closed this case. Thank you for contacting support.
You will shortly receive a satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
